column1: Redeyef (Arabic: الرّدَيِّف‎ Ar Rudayyif) is a town and commune in the Gafsa Governorate
column2: Tunisia. As of 2004 it had a population of 26
column3: 143. City industry is mainly based on mining.

column1: Redeyef is Terminus of railway line Métlaoui-Redeyef. This line
column2: used for transportation phosphates from mines
column3: is famous because is runs through scenic selja gorges.
